Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via  Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via  Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Pulaski.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
